Package model.interfaces

Interface IWeekLogic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Week

    public interface IWeekLogic
    Defines the operations of the calculations.

      • calculateTheBmiValueAccording

        float calculateTheBmiValueAccording​(float height,
                                    float weight)
        This function calculates the bmi value according to the height and weight.
        Parameters:
        height - The height of the user
        weight - The weight of the user
        Returns:
        the calculated value from the weight and height

      • calculateTheCaloriesValueAccording

        int calculateTheCaloriesValueAccording​(float bmi)
        This function calculates the calories value according to the bmi's value.
        Parameters:
        bmi - The value we calculate from the user's weight and height
        Returns:
        return with the kCal value the user should eat
